title: Smart children safety system in school bus transport using RFID and android (Child Tracker)
info: Smart children safety system in school bus transport using RFID and andriod. An app for Parents to track children in case of emergencies. The Demo uses a school bus RFID system but works well in a public network architecture of IOT devices. Project Done for Mumbai University Grant under Professor Supriya S. Kamoji.

title: Train a Smartcab to Drive
info: Applied reinforcement learning algorithm to build a simulated vehicle navigation agent. This project involved modeling a complex control problem in terms of limited available inputs, and designing a scheme to automatically learn an optimal driving strategy.

title: Finding Donors (Machine Learning)
info: Investigated factors that affect the likelihood of charity donations being made based on real census data. Developed a naive classifier to compare testing results.

title: eYantra Rescue Bot
info: Rescue operations are often laborious and dangerous to human life. Thus, we are deploying an Analyzer robot to assess the disaster stuck zone for possible targets/victims. The information collected by this robot is analysed and a 3D view of the localised is generated at the base station and the pin pointed location of the target is fed to the rescue robot which is equipped with a mechanical arm to pick up objects.

title: Robot using image processing libraries to follow an object/person.
info: Robot using image processing libraries to follow an object/person.

title: Nagios for infrastructure monitoring and data collection
info: Nagios was used for infrastructure monitoring and data collection for a network of devices. Automatic Scheduling of Systems using Nagios.
